fields.title: [GH:#4275 Ka0s-Klaus/ka0s] [INCIDENT]: Fallo en workflow Ka0s Audit Failed Pods -> iTop
fields.description: Resumen: [INCIDENT]: Fallo en workflow Ka0s Audit Failed Pods -> iTop Organizacion: Ka0s Solicitante: @santakloud Impacto: Service Urgencia: Medium Estado: New --- Descripcion original (GitHub): ### Organización Ka0s ### Solicitante @santakloud ### Estado New ### Impacto Service ### Urgencia Medium ### Servicio / CI afectado GitHub Actions / Ka0s Audit Failed Pods -> iTop ### Descripción El workflow **Ka0s Audit Failed Pods -> iTop** ha fallado durante su ejecución. **Detalles Técnicos:** - **Módulo**: [Ka0S] Audit Pods - **Run ID**: 22407316635 - **Commit**: 525a46849c08db45f9d564fdc2a492a66252af4a - **Branch/Ref**: main - **Actor**: santakloud ### Pasos / Evidencias Logs de ejecución: https://github.com/Ka0s-Klaus/ka0s/actions/runs/22407316635 --- Origen: GitHub Issue: https://github.com/Ka0s-Klaus/ka0s/issues/4275 Repo: Ka0s-Klaus/ka0s

entries.message:
Comentario de GitHub por ka0score:

Already up to date.
[main 0f348adf1] [Audit] Update failed pods and iTop reconciliation report 2026-02-25 17:04
To https://github.com/Ka0s-Klaus/ka0s
 ! [rejected]            main -> main (fetch first)
error: failed to push some refs to 'https://github.com/Ka0s-Klaus/ka0s'
 1 file changed, 554 insertions(+)
 create mode 100755 audit/kube/failed_pods.json
hint: Updates were rejected because the remote contains work that you do not
hint: have locally. This is usually caused by another repository pushing to
hint: the same ref. If you want to integrate the remote changes, use
hint: 'git pull' before pushing again.
hint: See the 'Note about fast-forwards' in 'git push --help' for details.
Error: Process completed with exit code 1.

No suele ser nu recurrente ni repetitivo en el tiempo y estamos trabajando en ello, pero podemos dar por cerrado este incidente.

https://github.com/Ka0s-Klaus/ka0s/issues/4275
